divs: sighting detailsnational ufo reporting center sighting report occurred : 9\20\2000 18:00 (entered as : 09\20\2000 18:00) reported: 11\1\2005 8:37:24 pm 20:37 posted: 11\3\2005 location: north bergen, nj shape: triangle duration:10 triangle spinning it was a clear day talking to a friend sitted facing the artificial lake in the park james bradock, when i notice a dark form over the three line what look like a plastic trahs back turns out to be a black triangle with no lights, moving slowly and at low altitute, when i mentioned that to my friend we stood up ,with my afghan dog by the leash after a couple of minutes of my skeptic friend asking what it was almost scare, the other witness got tangled with us,as he was walking and looking at the object at the same time, he was a white male blond, middle age, the comment was that it was probably a radio controlled model, i said i don't think so but it would be cool to have one!!. me and my friend tried to locate somebody with a camera to no avail. we follow the object, and then in the middle of the lake started to spin slowly on its axis!!, every 3 seconds more less , following and absolutely silent and straight path despite the mild wind moving the trees. i had the chance to compare against the 2 passenger planes in the horizon,this after the object heading for manhattan crossing the boulevard east,and the hudson river, it was completely flat from below no protruding shapes, and absolutely majestic and spooky in its fly solid in the air. i have found that a lady saw it too in rockland county,and reported it to jeff rense.com, while hiking she described mayan like designs and a hull on top this is because the exact date would be better known this way. ((nuforc note: witness indicates that the date of the event above is approximate. pd)) above the copy from nuforc but need to add up that direction of flight was west to east and the wind was blowing moving tree tops but the object was absolutely unafected , also it started spining as i was closer underneath it by the border of the artifitial lake walking north the i headed east following it my dog wasn't scared nor the golden retriever (i think it was that breed)of the other witness, my friend was looking for a camera but he was frighten so after a while he would only keep yelling about what it was he reamained at a distance all the time .so i walked to the parking lot of the building 8450 were i used to live. i was stoped by the fence delimitating the deep cliff above edgewater shore line so it did vanished going the manhattan shore line.
